name: No.Clip
description:
This is my first attempt at finishing a "game" so sorry in advance for the low quality. I mainly wanted to join a game jam and try it out and hopefully learn a few things. Thank you for giving it a try!  

This was appart of the 2020 Wowie Game Jam, where our theme was "Intentional Bugs" I used the best idea I could come up with and actually implement based on my current knowledge of game design, and hopefully I can compare this to the progress from the next years Wowie Game Jam. 

I really am stoked to play others games though so ill make it short.

No.Clip mostly speaks for itself its a "game" where clipping through walls is the main challenge.
